titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Railroad Picture Postcards Collection, 1970-1973
titlestmt.author: Processed by Jamie J. Greene

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Ann Mulfort April 2013

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: Collection consists of picture postcards regarding railroads from 1865-1880.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of picture postcards of the construction of the transcontinental railroad by the Union Pacific and Central Pacific Railroads, locomotives, Pullman sleeping cars and various other railroad scenes in the American West from 1866-1870.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

userestrict.head: Statement on Potentially Harmful Language and Images Found in Collections
userestrict.p: The American Heritage Center aspires to approach all areas of our work in ways that are respectful to those who create, use, and are represented in our collections. For a variety of reasons, however, users may encounter offensive or harmful language or images in some of our finding aids, catalogs, and collection materials.

Note that the AHC does not censor or alter contents of the collections as they provide context and evidence of a time, people, place, or event. Therefore, we encourage users to bring questions and concerns about descriptions in our finding aids to our attention via email or anonymous web-form. For more information, read our full statement.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections similar to this one at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was received from Evelynn Smith Oliner in 1973.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by Jamie J. Greene in November 2021.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Digital reproductions of select material from this collection are available at https://digitalcollections.uwyo.edu/luna/servlet/uwydbuwy~183~183.
